meta.executedQueryString:
import "strings"
from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:11:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> highestCurrent(n:2, groupColumns: ["loc"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["loc"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(fn : (column) =>  strings.title(v: column))

import "strings"
from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:11:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hum")
  |> highestCurrent(n:2, groupColumns: ["loc"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["loc"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(fn : (column) =>  strings.title(v: column))

import "regexp"
import "strings"
from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:11:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "racks" and r["_field"]=="total_rack")
  |> unique(column: "loc")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: last, createEmpty: false) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","loc","longitude","_measurement","latitude","name"])
  |> rename(fn: (column) => strings.title(v:regexp.replaceAllString(r: /_/, v: column, t: " ") + "s"))
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "regexp"
import "strings"
from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:11:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "racks" and r["_field"]=="free_rack")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: last, createEmpty: false) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","loc","_measurement"])
  |> top(n:3, columns: ["_time","name"])
  |> rename(fn: (column) => strings.title(v:regexp.replaceAllString(r: /_/, v: column, t: " "))+"s")
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "regexp"
import "strings"
from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:11:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "racks" and r["_field"]=="total_rack_units")
  |> unique(column: "loc")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: last, createEmpty: false) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","loc","longitude","_measurement","latitude","name"])
  |> rename(fn: (column) => strings.title(v:regexp.replaceAllString(r: /_/, v: column, t: " ")))
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "regexp"
import "strings"
from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:11:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "racks" and r["_field"]=="free_rack_units")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: last, createEmpty: false) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","loc","_measurement"])
  |> top(n:3, columns: ["_time","name"])
  |> rename(fn: (column) => strings.title(v:regexp.replaceAllString(r: /_/, v: column, t: " ")))

from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:11:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "racks")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","loc"])
  |> rename(columns:{free_rack_units:"metric"})
  |> top(n:3, columns: ["_time","name"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "strings"
from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:21:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["loc"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","_field"])
  |> rename(fn : (column) =>  strings.title(v: column))
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "strings"
from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:21:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hum" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["loc"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","_field"])
  |> rename(fn : (column) =>  strings.title(v: column))

import "strings"
from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:11:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "racks" and r["_field"]=="free_rack_units")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: last, createEmpty: false) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop"])
  |> rename(columns:{free_rack_units:""})
  |> top(n:1, columns: ["_time","name"])
  |> rename(fn : (column) =>  strings.title(v: column))
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "strings"
from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:25:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pwr" and r["loc"]=="london" and 
  r["_field"]=="performance" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 100ms, fn: last, createEmpty: false) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["rackid"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","_field","loc","_measurement","rackid"])
  |> rename(fn: (column) => "Rack " + column)

import "strings"
from(bucket: "test1")
  |> range(start: 2021-08-19T14:25:16Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pwr" and r["loc"]=="london" and r["_field"]=="power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 100ms, fn: last, createEmpty: false) 
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["rackid"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","_field","loc","_measurement","rackid"])
  |> rename(fn: (column) => "Rack " + column)
